name: The PirateBay (piratebays.eu) Black Theme
description:
This is an edited version of The PirateBay (pirateproxie.sx) Black Theme originally made by [04jberry].
If you have any suggestions, feel free to leave me a message. :)
If you have any requests feel free to make so, I'll try my best.
additional_info:
Only instruction:
If you're using a different piratebay site edit the following line:

"@-moz-document domain("piratebays.eu")" ...and change "piratebays.eu" to the domain of the piratebay site you use.

Enjoy. :)
